roleset.name: cause to not have
roleset.note: DEPRIVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deprive' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from deprive.01-v predicate notes)
DEPRIVATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with deprive.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from deprivation.01-n)

example.name: no agent
example.text: Still, criminal defense lawyers worry that defendants-1 are being deprived *trace*-1 of their Sixth Amendment right to counsel and a fair trial if the government can seize lawyers' fees.
example.arg: of their Sixth Amendment right to counsel and a fair trial
if the government can seize lawyers' fees

example.name: with agent, verbnetted
example.text: [The privatization program]-1 is designed *trace*-1 to deprive the government of hundreds of assets and to raise critically needed funds.

example.name: Arg1 and Arg2
example.text: Todd's sleep deprivation was causing him to hallucinate.
